name: dateify
title: Dateify
description: An extension to paste the current date into your active window in order to document when a change was made or when you edited or reviewed an item.
author: drhoobs

commands.name: long-date
commands.title: Long Date
commands.subtitle: longdate
commands.description: Pastes the date in format DD/MM/YYYY @ HH:MM:SS

commands.name: short-date
commands.title: Short Date
commands.subtitle: shortdate
commands.description: Pastes the date in format DD/MM/YY @ HH:MM

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
